mapper.select: SELECT NAME, CODE, (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.CODE=H.CODE AND M.AUTH=3) AS MANAGER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.CODE=H.CODE) AS CNT FROM HOSPITAL H WHERE CODE LIKE #{code}||'\_'||'%' ESCAPE '\' ORDER BY NAME, CODE

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY NAME ASC, CODE ASC) AS RNUM, NAME, CODE, (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.CODE=H.CODE AND M.AUTH=3) AS MANAGER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.CODE=H.CODE) AS CNT FROM HOSPITAL H WHERE CODE LIKE #{code}||'\_'||'%' ESCAPE '\' ORDER BY NAME, CODE) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE CODE=#{code} AND AUTH=3
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM HOSPITAL H WHERE CODE LIKE #{code}||'\_'||'%' ESCAPE '\'

SELECT C.ID, C.WDATE, C.TIME, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.ID=C.ID) AS NAME FROM CALENDAR C WHERE TO_CHAR(C.WDATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date} AND (SELECT CODE FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.ID=C.ID) = #{code} ORDER BY C.WDATE ASC, NAME ASC
